quote:
It is the relationship between the physical environment and the environed organism, between physiography and ontography (to coin a term), that constitutes the essential principles of geography today.
    
    William Morris Davis
author: William Morris Davis

quote:
Without risks my friends there is no progress, no advancement either in science or technology.
    
    Sunday Adelaja
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote:
Here lies one from a distant star, but the soil is not alien to him, for in death he belongs to the universe.
    
    Clifford D. Simak,
    
      Way Station
author: Clifford D. Simak

quote:
He did not know that the Old One was his father, for such a relationship was utterly beyond his understanding, but as he looked at the emaciated body he felt a dim disquiet that was the ancestor of sadness.
    
    Arthur C. Clarke,
    
      2001: A Space Odyssey
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote:
Not that there's anything wrong with just lying around on your back. In it's way, rotting is interesting too, as we will see. It's just that there are other ways to spend your time as a cadaver.
    
    Mary Roach,
    
      Stiff: The Curious Lives of Human Cadavers
author: Mary Roach

quote:
The least I can do is speak out for the hundreds of chimpanzees who, right now, sit hunched, miserable and without hope, staring out with dead eyes from their metal prisons. They cannot speak for themselves.
    
    Jane Goodall
author: Jane Goodall

quote:
A wish was not truly a wish, until it was properly wished.
    
    James Qualls,
    
      A Gathering of Dreams
author: James Qualls

quote:
Try to remember that artists in these catastrophic times, along with the serious scientists, are the only salvation for us, if there is to be any.
    
    William H. Gass
author: William H. Gass

quote:
It is clear that ignorance is not that hate each other .... but that we continue in the same direction
    
    Hesham Nebr
author: Hesham Nebr

quote:
Human mind is the only real hope for the future of humanity! Have faith in human mind which is the only instrument who can protect you in this savage universe!
    
    Mehmet Murat ildan
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote:
For the scientist, at exactly the moment of discoverythat most unstable existential momentthe external world, nature itself, deeply confirms his innermost fantastic convictions. Anchored abruptly in the world, Leviathan gasping on his hook, he is saved from extreme mental disorder by the most profound affirmation of the real.
    
    Richard Rhodes,
    
      The Making of the Atomic Bomb
author: Richard Rhodes

quote:
Its pretty confusing.Good. Be confused. Confusion is where inspiration comes from.
    
    Robyn Mundell,
    
      Brainwalker
author: Robyn Mundell

quote:
Springs of living water shall flow from the holy ground.
    
    Lailah Gifty Akita
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote:
Wonder is the starter kit for innovation
    
    Tara Lemmy
author: Tara Lemmy

quote:
you create your world with your thoughts
    
    Rhonda Byrne,
    
      The Secret
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote:
Who can count the sand by the sea?
    
    Lailah Gifty Akita
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote:
Man is manifestly not the measure of all things. This universe is shot through with mystery. The very fact of its being, and of our own, is a mystery absolute, and the only miracle worthy of the name.
    
    Sam Harris,
    
      The End of Faith: Religion, Terror, and the Future of Reason
author: Sam Harris

quote:
We know enough at this moment to say that the God of Abraham is not only unworthy of the immensity of creation; he is unworthy even of man.
    
    Sam Harris
author: Sam Harris

quote:
Science tells me God must exist.My mind tells me I'll never understand God.My heart tells me I'm not meant to. [Vittoria Vetra]
    
    Dan Brown,
    
      Angels & Demons
author: Dan Brown

quote:
Faith and science, I have learned, are two sides of the same coin, separated by an expanse so small, but wide enough that one side can't see the other. They don't know they are connected.
    
    Mary E. Pearson,
    
      The Adoration of Jenna Fox
author: Mary E. Pearson

quote:
Faith is a fine inventionWhen gentlemen can see,But microscopes are prudentIn an emergency.
    
    Emily Dickinson
author: Emily Dickinson

quote:
What we call rational grounds for our beliefs are often extremely irrational attempts to justify our instincts.
    
    Thomas Henry Huxley
author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quote:
Science only goes so far, then comes God.- Noah Calhoun-
    
    Nicholas Sparks,
    
      The Notebook
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote:
The truth of our faith becomes a matter of ridicule among the infidels if any Catholic, not gifted with the necessary scientific learning, presents as dogma what scientific scrutiny shows to be false.
    
    Thomas Aquinas
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote:
knowledge, absolutely sure of its infallibility, is faith
    
    Yevgeny Zamyatin,
    
      We
author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quote:
Faith and science, I have learned, are two sides of the same coin, separated by an expanse so small, but wide enough that one side can't see the other. They don't even know they're connected. Father and Lily were two sides of the same coin, I've decided, and maybe I am the space in between.
    
    Mary E. Pearson,
    
      The Adoration of Jenna Fox
author: Mary E. Pearson

quote:
The more I read arguments for atheism, the more I am convinced it takes a very strong faith to be an atheist. And atheism seems to me the least reasonable of all faiths.
    
    Corrado Ghinamo,
    
      The Beautiful Scientist: A Spiritual Approach to Science
author: Corrado Ghinamo

quote:
By denying scientific principles, one may maintain any paradox.
    
    Galileo Galilei
author: Galileo Galilei

quote:
The more you delve into science, the more it appears to rely on faith.
    
    Jon Stewart
author: Jon Stewart

quote:
You may be surprised to know that I consider science to be a friend of faith. - SHROUDED: A Crispin Leads Mystery
    
    Meredith Lee
author: Meredith Lee

quote:
Let it be admitted at once, mournful as the admission is, that every instinct in his intelligence went out at first to greet the new light. It had hardly done so, when a recollection of the opening chapter of 'Genesis' checked it at the outset.
    
    Edmund Gosse,
    
      Father and Son
author: Edmund Gosse

quote:
Faith is a sacred fruit.
    
    Lailah Gifty Akita
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote:
The will to believe has given us our great saints. The will to doubt has given us our great scientists. The goal of the intelligent man is a character in which the will to believe of the saint and the will to doubt of the scientist meet and mingle.
    
    Glenn  Frank
author: Glenn  Frank

quote:
I can't imagine the scientists wanting me to walk into the lab and start fiddling around with some big bowl of electrons they had out.
    
    Jim Benton,
    
      Okay, So Maybe I Do Have Superpowers
author: Jim Benton

quote:
The humble Cumulus humilis - never hurt a soul.
    
    Gavin Pretor-Pinney,
    
      The Cloudspotter's Guide
author: Gavin Pretor-Pinney

quote:
...space flight still had a long way to go to catch up with the safety record of the milkshake industry.
    
    Kevin Fong
author: Kevin Fong

quote:
Don't trip over the mycelium unless you've gotten over the branches
    
    Noah Reznik
author: Noah Reznik

quote:
Meg, what I'm about to do - never, ever try this on your own." I felt a bit silly giving this advice to a girl who regulartly fought monsters with golden swords, but I had promised Bill Nye the Science Guy I would always promote safe laboratory practices.
    
    Rick Riordan,
    
      The Dark Prophecy
author: Rick Riordan

quote:
Certein bodies... become luminous when heated. Their luminosity disappears after some time, but the capacity of becoming luminous afresh through heat is restored to them by the action of a spark, and also by the action of radium.
    
    Marie Curie
author: Marie Curie

quote:
Keeping the box closed just keeps you in the dark, not the universe... but failing to open the box doesn't kill the cat.
    
    John Green,
    
      Will Grayson, Will Grayson
author: John Green

quote:
Deux choses sont infinies : lUnivers et la btise humaine. Mais, en ce qui concerne lUnivers, je nen ai pas encore acquis la certitude absolue.
    
    Albert Einstein
author: Albert Einstein

quote:
This theory [the oxygen theory] is not as I have heard it described, that of the French chemists, it is mine (elle est la mienne); it is a property which I claim from my contemporaries and from posterity.
    
    Antoine Lavoisier
author: Antoine Lavoisier

quote:
Gay-Lussac was quick, lively, ingenious and profound, with great activity of mind and great facility of manipulation. I should place him at the head of all the living chemists in France.
    
    Humphry Davy
author: Humphry Davy

quote:
What is a stratosphere fourteen miles fromthe earth or a sunken glass house onthe sea-bottom amid fish and feather-stars unless a bet that man can shoveon beyond yesterday's record of manthe hoper, the believer?
    
    Carl Sandburg,
    
      Selected Poems
author: Carl Sandburg

quote:
Have faith that the results that you are looking for will come from the fruition of your research.
    
    Steven Magee
author: Steven Magee

quote:
The highest faith there is, is faith in objective reality.
    
    Marty Rubin
author: Marty Rubin

quote: What is it with science these days? Everyone is so quick to believe in it, in all these new scientific discoveries, new pills for this, new pills for that. Get thinner, grow hair, yada, yada, yada, but when it requires a little faith in something you all go crazy.' He shook his head, 'If miracles had chemical equations then everyone would believe.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: You cannot explore the universe if you think that you are the center of it.
author: Joshua Suya Pelicano

quote: Your Excellency, I have no need of this hypothesis.
author: Pierre-Simon Laplace

quote: We understand more than we know.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Imagination is an endless possibility.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Facts do not fall in the face of discomfort.
Life isn't about just talking, it's about thinking too.
author: Marie Symeou

quote: We are capable of anything and everything.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Invest in your purpose and land of promise.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Everything looks for you when you become great.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The idea of life is maximizing your time and living and effective life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To live an effective life, you have to turn your back on the things of the world.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There is always something to appreciate in people.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You get divine blessings when you love and cherish both those who love and hate you.
author: Sunday Adelaja
